I am working as a software engineer at Samsung Research Institute Bangalore. I majored in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur. At IIT Kanpur, I had the previlege to work on many projects with amazing professors and colleagues. At the end of my third year, I did a summer internship at Samsung Research Institute Bangalore. I also had a wonderful opportunity to study at Aalto University, Finland for one semester as an exchange student.

Much of my undergrad research concerns reinforcement learning and computer vision. Apart from academics, I enjoy cycling and playing Ultimate.
